authors: Samuel Marino, Nibrodooh, Vince, Samuel Terrazas, chris-b, Magik, James W.
instructions: # Character Sheet This sheet was inspired by Actoba's D&D 5E sheet. The Pathfinder sheet uses tab navigation, repeating fields, show/hide sub-sections, Configuration tab, and auto-calculates numerous fields, such as, Ability scores & mods, Skills, HP, Saves, total-attack, and total-damage as guided by the rules as written.  Nearly every auto-calculated attribute on the sheet is handled by sheet worker script(javascript) which helps to significantly enhance the sheet's performance.## Attributes* Mouse over any field to get its attribute name to help with token/ability macros.* All field titles follow Roll20's attribute syntax, ie. AC would be displayed as "@{AC}" on mouse-over.## Rolls* You can mouse over any button to get its attribute/ability name.* Roll button titles follow Roll20's ability syntax, using the selected token, ie. "%{selected|STR-check}" or "@{selected|repeating_weapon_$X_attack-roll".## NPC stat block* Use the NPC tab for easy stat-block input.## Additional Notes* Use the [Pathfinder Sheet Guide](https://wiki.roll20.net/Pathfinder_Character_Sheet) on the Roll20 wiki for more details.* Questions, comments, suggestions, please post in the Character Sheets forum: [Pathfinder sheet thread 5](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/2788628/pf-pathfinder-sheet-thread-5)## Special Thanks* Sam M. (sheet creator)* Everyone in the character sheet test game.
